description: Google is a multinational technology company specializing in Internet-related services and products. They are known for their search engine, online advertising technologies, and popular mobile operating system, Android. At Google, we value innovation, diversity, inclusion, and collaboration. Our mission is to organize the world's information and make it universally accessible and useful.
title: Machine Learning Engineer

requirements.education: Master's degree or Ph.D. in Computer Science or related field
skills: Strong programming skills in one or more of the following languages: Java, Python, Go
Experience with distributed systems and large-scale data processing
Strong problem-solving and communication skills
Experience with machine learning and artificial intelligence
certifications: Google Cloud Certified - Professional Cloud Architect
Google Cloud Certified - Professional Data Engineer
Google Cloud Certified - Professional Cloud Developer

description: Microsoft Corporation is an American multinational technology company that develops, licenses, and sells computer software, consumer electronics, and personal computers. They are known for their Windows operating system, Microsoft Office Suite, and Xbox gaming console. At Microsoft, we value diversity, inclusion, collaboration, and innovation. Our mission is to empower every person and every organization on the planet to achieve more.
title: Senior Software Engineer

requirements.education: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field
skills: Strong programming skills in one or more of the following languages: C#, Java, C++

certifications: Microsoft Certified: Azure Solutions Architect Expert

Our mission is to give people the power to build community and bring the world closer together.

title: Senior Mechanical Engineer
location_address: 3500 Deer Creek Road, Palo Alto, CA

requirements.education: Bachelor's or Master's degree in Mechanical Engineering or related field

Experience with manufacturing processes such as casting, machining, and welding
Strong problem-solving and communication skills

description: Intel is an American multinational technology company that designs and manufactures computer processors, chipsets, and other hardware components. Our mission is to shape the future of technology by driving innovation and advancing the computing industry. We are looking for talented individuals who are passionate about pushing the boundaries of technology.
title: Senior Hardware Engineer
location_address: 2200 Mission College Blvd, Santa Clara, CA
